text:
Hi folks, I would like to ask your advice!
I am non-developer who is interested in learning how to develop Operations Hub Pro's custom workflow, API integration with other apps, and custom coded events.
I haven't found any hands-on training or module courses in academy, please do correct me if I am missing.

What would be the best way to learn and practice those things? Any paid courses such as Udemy is also welcomed.
Thank you so much!!
